alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:21PM CDT until August 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LACLEDE COUNTY... At 720 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 707pm a barn was destroyed and a roof was damaged near the intersection of Highway 64 and Highway AA. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon... Twin Bridges... Competition... Lynchburg... Dry Knob... Falcon... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 123 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
